featured.text: Mary lost ten kilograms in three months, so her _____ skin-tight jeans are now hanging off her hips.
Interestingly, both of them 16 buying the same pair of jeans.
Teens rated Hilfiger jeans as their number one brand in a survey in 2000.

definition.zh_def: 一種用牛仔布製成的褲子，通常是藍色的，並且有多種款式和設計。
definition.en_def: A type of pants made from denim fabric, typically blue, available in various styles and designs.
definition.example: She wore a pair of stylish jeans to the party.
